alert.note: Alert for Bighorn Canyon; Golden Valley; Musselshell; Northern Big Horn; Northern Carbon; Northern Stillwater; Pryor, Northern Bighorn Mountains; Southeastern Carbon; Southern Big Horn; Southwestern Yellowstone (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 18 at 9:13PM MST by NWS Billings
info.description: ...LIGHT TO MODERATE SNOW SHOWERS TO IMPACT THE AREA THIS EVENING... A band of light to moderate snow showers will move through the area this evening. These snow showers will quickly lower visibility below one mile at times. The heavier snow showers could drop up to an inch of snow as they move through. Road surfaces could become snow covered and slick. Conditions will quickly change as snow showers move through, so travelers are urged to use caution. Locations impacted include... Billings, Columbus, Laurel, Bridger, Joliet, Fromberg, Lodge Grass, Lockwood, Fort Smith, Huntley, Pryor, Shepherd, Billings Heights, Billings West End, Broadview, Lavina, Halfbreed Lake Wildlife, Edgar, Silesia and Warren. Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time when traveling.
